project.description: Cleans up resources from the cloud as a specified account/user.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: eucarc
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Text from the eucarc file generated by the CLC
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: EUCA_KEY_DIR=$(cd $(dirname ${BASH_SOURCE:-$0}); pwd -P) export EC2_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/compute export S3_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/objectstorage export EUARE_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/Euare export TOKEN_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/Tokens export AWS_AUTO_SCALING_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/AutoScaling export AWS_CLOUDWATCH_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/CloudWatch export AWS_ELB_URL=http://10.111.1.67:8773/services/LoadBalancing export EUSTORE_URL=http://emis.eucalyptus.com/ export EC2_PRIVATE_KEY=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/euca2-admin-47e61b6f-pk.pem export EC2_CERT=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/euca2-admin-47e61b6f-cert.pem export EC2_JVM_ARGS=-Djavax.net.ssl.trustStore=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/jssecacerts export EUCALYPTUS_CERT=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/cloud-cert.pem export EC2_ACCOUNT_NUMBER='130867204479' export EC2_ACCESS_KEY='AKIIORMBFCMQMPVQU4MK' export EC2_SECRET_KEY='u8nFPRuUj7fXL2dfbT79kbpsdcnzuRcVBLbP6Fsf' export AWS_ACCESS_KEY='AKIIORMBFCMQMPVQU4MK' export AWS_SECRET_KEY='u8nFPRuUj7fXL2dfbT79kbpsdcnzuRcVBLbP6Fsf' export AWS_CREDENTIAL_FILE=${EUCA_KEY_DIR}/iamrc export EC2_USER_ID='130867204479' alias ec2-bundle-image="ec2-bundle-image --cert ${EC2_CERT} --privatekey ${EC2_PRIVATE_KEY} --user ${EC2_ACCOUNT_NUMBER} --ec2cert ${EUCALYPTUS_CERT}" alias ec2-upload-bundle="ec2-upload-bundle -a ${EC2_ACCESS_KEY} -s ${EC2_SECRET_KEY} --url ${S3_URL}"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### CLONE TEST REPO git clone $eutester_repo_url repo cd repo git checkout $eutester_branch cd .. mkdir credentials cat > credentials/eucarc <<EOF $eucarc EOF
mkdir virtualenv/ rsync -va /var/lib/jenkins/share/eutester-base/ virtualenv/ >> $WORKSPACE/install.log
cd repo ../virtualenv/bin/python setup.py install >> $WORKSPACE/install.log
../virtualenv/bin/python $eutester_script --credpath ../credentials
